content.text:
# Draft:Danilo Smiljkovic (revolutionary)

Danilo Smiljković (Serbian Cyrillic: Данило Смиљковић; born c. 1870) was a Serbian revolutionary, a member of the Serbian Chetnik Organization.
Danilo Smiljković was born in the village of Cerovo in the Municipality of Želino, today North Macedonia, but then part of the Ottoman Empire. He first entered the Serbian Chetnik Organization in 1896. He was a close friend of Milutin Janković, Bogosav Srečković of Gornja Ljuboviđa, and Bogdan Krstić of Čačak, all members of his cheta.
